entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 6 May 2023
